Options: Walking at a comfortable pace, gradually increase duration over time
Day1.Description2: Focus on major muscle groups with proper form.
Exercises: Lunges with chair support (3 sets of 10 repetitions per leg)
Seated rows with resistance bands (3 sets of 10 repetitions)
Overhead press with light weights (3 sets of 10 repetitions)

Day2.Description1: Light stretching, gentle yoga, or walking at a slow pace.

Day3.Description1: Swimming (low-impact, full-body workout, adjust strokes or pace for your comfort).
Day3.Description2: Gentle exercises that target core muscles.
Exercises: Modified planks on forearms (hold for as long as comfortable, repeat 3 times)
Bird-dogs (3 sets of 10 repetitions per side)

Day4.Description1: Allow your body to recover and rebuild muscle.

Day5.Description1: Water aerobics class (low-impact, social, and fun).
Day5.Description2: Static stretches to improve range of motion.

Day6.Description1: Light activity like walking, yoga, or gentle stretching for 15-20 minutes.

Day7.Description1: Choose a low-impact activity you enjoy.
Options: Light hike or walk in nature with frequent breaks
Adapted sports like adaptive tennis or bocce ball
